statements: SELECT * FROM budget_tracking;
SELECT budget_name, budget_amount FROM budget_tracking WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, budget_name, budget_amount FROM budget_tracking WHERE budget_amount < 1000;
SELECT budget_name, start_date, end_date FROM budget_tracking ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM budget_tracking WHERE customer_id = '382e636b-4a7c-4769-bbae-020d6385b29b';
SELECT * FROM budget_tracking WHERE budget_amount > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT budget_id, budget_name, budget_amount FROM budget_tracking WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' AND customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY budget_name ASC

SELECT budget_id, budget_name, budget_amount, start_date, end_date FROM budget_tracking WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, COUNT(budget_id) AS total_budgets FROM budget_tracking GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_budgets > 3 ORDER BY total_budgets DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(budget_amount) AS total_budget_amount FROM budget_tracking GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_budget_amount < 50000 ORDER BY total_budget_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM budgets WHERE budget_id = 1;
SELECT budget_name, total_amount FROM budgets WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT category_name FROM spending_categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM budgets ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM spending_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM budgets WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT budget_id, budget_name, total_amount FROM budgets WHERE customer_id = 25 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT budget_id, budget_name, total_amount FROM budgets WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT b.budget_id, b.budget_name, sc.category_id, sc.category_name FROM budgets b JOIN spending_categories sc ON b.budget_id = sc.category_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_budgets, MAX(total_amount) as highest_amount FROM budgets;
SELECT * FROM budgets;
SELECT budget_id, budget_name, amount FROM budgets WHERE amount > 10000;
SELECT goal_name, target_amount, deadline FROM financial_goals WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT category_name, description FROM spending_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_budget FROM budgets GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM budgets ORDER BY amount DESC, start_date
SELECT budget_name, amount, start_date, end_date FROM budgets WHERE amount > 10000 AND start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT b.budget_name, f.goal_name, f.current_amount FROM budgets b INNER JOIN financial_goals f ON b.customer_id = f.customer_id ORDER BY f.current_amount DESC
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS category_count FROM spending_categories GROUP BY category_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT b.budget_id, f.goal_id, s.category_id FROM budgets b, financial_goals f, spending_categories s WHERE b.customer_id = f.customer_id AND f.customer_id = 1 AND s.category_name = 'Groceries'
SELECT * FROM budgets ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, budget_amount FROM budgets WHERE budget_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customer_finances WHERE customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT goal_description, goal_amount, goal_completion_date FROM financial_goals WHERE goal_completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT category_name FROM spending_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM budgets WHERE budget_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, budget_amount FROM budgets b JOIN customer_finances cf ON b.customer_id = cf.customer_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM financial_goals WHERE goal_completion_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, goal_amount FROM financial_goals fg JOIN customer_finances cf ON fg.customer_id = cf.customer_id ORDER BY goal_amount DESC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) FROM spending_categories GROUP BY category_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Budgets;
SELECT budget_name, budget_amount FROM Budgets WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT category_name, description FROM SpendingCategories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM FinancialGoals WHERE goal_amount > 5000;
SELECT transaction_date, amount, notes FROM Transactions WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT budget_id, budget_name, budget_amount, start_date, end_date FROM Budgets WHERE budget_amount > 1000 ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT goal_id, goal_name, goal_amount, target_date FROM FinancialGoals WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY target_date;
SELECT category_id, category_name, description FROM SpendingCategories WHERE category_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY category_id DESC;

SELECT budget_id, budget_name, budget_amount, start_date, end_date, category_name, allocation_amount FROM Budgets b JOIN BudgetAllocations ba ON b.budget_id = ba.budget_id JOIN SpendingCategories sc ON ba.category_id = sc.category_id;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_date, t.amount, t.notes, bc.category_name FROM Transactions t JOIN SpendingCategories bc ON t.category_id = bc.category_id WHERE t.amount < 0 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC, t.amount ASC;
